H0.text: What swirly pattern is named after the administrative central town of Renfrewshire in Scotland. Glasgow

H1.text: What swirly pattern is named after the administrative central town of Renfrewshire in Scotland. Stirling

H2.text: What swirly pattern is named after the administrative central town of Renfrewshire in Scotland. Perth

H3.text: What swirly pattern is named after the administrative central town of Renfrewshire in Scotland. Paisley

A4.text: It serves as the administrative centre for the Renfrewshire council area

A5.text: It is the largest town in the historic county of the same name
